author: AP
title: UGa football official hospitalized nearly 6 weeks with virus
description: The video coordinator for Georgia’s football team has been released from the hospital after becoming critically ill from the coronavirus
content:
ATHENS, Ga. (AP) — The video coordinator for Georgia’s football team was released from the hospital Thursday after becoming critically ill from the coronavirus.
 Head coach Kirby Smart was among hundreds on hand at Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center to … [+2553 chars]
